Package Steganography.Logic

The Steganography.Logic package contains all the classes used to handle the steganography, encryption and compression processes (and more...) in the Steganography package.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AESEncryption
    The AESEncryption class handles the encryption/decryption operation of either a byte array or a file to ensure more security for the steganographic process using password-based AES encryption.
    BaseSteganography
    The abstract BaseSteganography class is the superclass of all the classes used in the steganographic process.
    GifSequenceWriter
    The GifSequenceWriter class is used by GifSteganography class to create a GIF89a image based on an array of BufferedImage and an array of IIOMetadata.
    GifSteganography
    The GifSteganography class handles the steganographic process for GIF89a images using the Least Significant Bit (LSB) method.
    HiddenData
    The HiddenData class is used to store information on the data to embed/extract during the steganographic process.
    ImageInImageSteganography
    The ImageInImageSteganography class handles the steganographic process of embedding a 24-bit, RGB Bitmap image into another using the Least Significant Bit (LSB) method.
    ImageSteganography
    The ImageSteganography class handles the steganographic process for 24-bit, RGB Bitmap images using the Least Significant Bit (LSB) method.
    Metadata
    The Metadata class is used by GifSteganography and GifSequenceWriter to extract metadata from a gif image.
    Utils
    The final Utils class contains methods used by other classes in the project to reduce redundancy.
    ZLibCompression
    The ZLibCompression class handles the compression/decompression of a file or byte array to reduce the effect of the embedded data on the steganographic image using the Java ZLib compression/decompression library.
